Trong bÃ i viáº¿t nÃ y, tÃ´i sáº½ liá»‡t kÃª má»™t sá»‘ hÃ m tiá»‡n Ã­ch JavaScript há»¯u Ã­ch nháº¥t mÃ  tÃ´i Ä‘Ã£ sá»­ dá»¥ng trong cÃ¡c dá»± Ã¡n cá»§a mÃ¬nh.

1. GetValuesByKeyâ€‹

HÃ m nÃ y sáº½ giÃºp báº¡n láº¥y cÃ¡c giÃ¡ trá»‹ cÃ³ cÃ¹ng tÃªn field trong má»™t object, bao gá»“m cÃ¡c object con lá»“ng nhau. NÃ³ sáº½ tráº£ vá» má»™t máº£ng cÃ¡c giÃ¡ trá»‹ tÃ¬m Ä‘Æ°á»£c.

GetValuesByKey.js
/**
 * Get all values of specific key in object
 * @param {object} obj A javascript object to get values
 * @param {string} key A key of object
 * @returns 
 */
function GetValuesByKey(obj, key) {
    let values = [];
    for (let i in obj) {
        if (!obj.hasOwnProperty(i)) continue;
        if (typeof obj[i] == 'object') {
            values = values.concat(GetValuesByKey(obj[i], key));
        } else if (i == key) {
            values.push(obj[i]);
        }
    }
    return values;
}

2. Flatten objectâ€‹

2.1. Flatten objectâ€‹

HÃ m nÃ y sáº½ giÃºp báº¡n lÃ m pháº³ng má»™t object cÃ³ cÃ¡c object con lá»“ng nhau. NÃ³ sáº½ tráº£ vá» má»™t object má»›i vá»›i cÃ¡c key lÃ  key cá»§a cÃ¡c object con lá»“ng nhau.

  • Source code ğŸ“ƒ
  • Cháº¡y thá»­ ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»
FlattenObject.js
/**
 * Flattens an object to a single level object
 * @param {object} obj Object to flatten 
 * @returns An object with all keys and values flattened
 */
function FlattenObject(obj) {
    const flattened = {};

    Object.keys(obj).forEach((key) => {
        if (typeof obj[key] === 'object' && obj[key] !== null) {
            Object.assign(flattened, flattenObject(obj[key]));
        } else {
            flattened[key] = obj[key];
        }
    });

    return flattened;
}

/**
 * Flattens an object to a single level object
 * @param {object} obj Object to flatten 
 * @returns An object with all keys and values flattened
 */
function FlattenObject(obj) {
  const flattened = {};


  Object.keys(obj).forEach((key) => {
    if (typeof obj[key] === 'object' && obj[key] !== null) {
      Object.assign(flattened, FlattenObject(obj[key]));
    } else {
      flattened[key] = obj[key];
    }
  });


  return flattened;
}

2.2. Flatten object with keyâ€‹

HÃ m nÃ y sáº½ giÃºp báº¡n lÃ m pháº³ng má»™t object cÃ³ cÃ¡c object con lá»“ng nhau. NÃ³ sáº½ tráº£ vá» má»™t object má»›i vá»›i cÃ¡c key lÃ  key cá»§a cÃ¡c object con lá»“ng nhau, nhÆ°ng cÃ³ thÃªm key cá»§a object cha á»Ÿ Ä‘áº§u key cá»§a object con.

  • Source code ğŸ“ƒ
  • Cháº¡y thá»­ ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’»
FlattenObjectWithKey.js
/**
 * Flattens a javascript object with the keys as the path
 * @param {object} obj A javascript object to flatten
 * @param {string} prefix A prefix to add to keys
 * @returns An object with all keys and values flattened
 */
function FlattenObjectWithKey(obj, prefix = '') {
    return Object.keys(obj).reduce((acc, k) => {
        const pre = prefix.length ? `${prefix}.` : '';
        if (typeof obj[k] === 'object' && obj[k] !== null && !Array.isArray(obj[k])) {
            Object.assign(acc, FlattenObjectWithKey(obj[k], pre + k));
        } else {
            acc[pre + k] = obj[k];
        }
        return acc;
    }, {});
}

function FlattenObjectWithKey(obj, prefix = '') {
  return Object.keys(obj).reduce((acc, k) => {
    const pre = prefix.length ? `${prefix}.` : '';
    if (typeof obj[k] === 'object' && obj[k] !== null && !Array.isArray(obj[k])) {
      Object.assign(acc, FlattenObjectWithKey(obj[k], pre + k));
    } else {
      acc[pre + k] = obj[k];
    }
    return acc;
  }, {});
}

}
